name: multiposter
template:
customize :
{SourceFolder} = Droidrun
{Caption} = enter_caption
{Apps} = instagram, x , LinkedIn 

Goal : Post the latest photo from "{SourceFolder}" to the apps defined in {Apps}.

Smart Logic:
1. Content Prep:
   - Generate/Finalize {Caption} and required details (hashtags, etc.) by yourself.
   - Copy {Caption} to clipboard.

2. Scope Definition:
   - Check {Apps}. 
   - If {Apps} contains specific names (e.g., "Instagram, X"): Create a "Target List" of only those apps.
   - If {Apps} says "All Installed...": Create a "Target List" by scanning for ANY app categorized as Social/Chat.

3. Execution Loop (Repeat for items in Target List):
   - Open the current app from the Target List.
   - Tap the "Create" / "Upload" / "+" button.
   - When the media picker opens, navigate to Gallery -> Albums.
   - Scroll down and find > {SourceFolder}.
   - Open and select the most recent image (as initially told).
   - Paste {Caption} from clipboard into the text field.
   - Tap "Post".
   - Wait for "Posting/Sent" notification.
   - Close app and proceed to the next item in Target List.

4. Completion: Clear clipboard.
